definition: the human chest and especially the front part of the chest
examples: hugged the child to his bosom

definition: a woman's breasts regarded especially as a single feature, breast
examples: a woman with an ample bosom

definition: the chest conceived of as the seat of the emotions and intimate feelings
examples: a story you will take to your bosom

definition: the security and intimacy of or like that of being hugged to someone's bosom
the part of a garment that covers the chest or the breasts
to enclose in or as if in an embrace
examples: a Gothic, moss-grown structure, half bosomed in trees

definition: to enclose or carry in the bosom (see bosom entry 1)
